title: Pro Bike: Joss Lowden Hour Record set on old Argon 18, new FFWD Disc-T Lion wheels, LeCol kit
content:
Six weeks ago Joss Lowden set a new womenâ€™s Hour Record at the Velodrome Suisse, riding an old Argon 18 Electron Pro track bike, a new set of FFWD Disc-T Lion wheels you can buy as of today, and wearing a LeCol x McLaren Project Aero skinsuit now available for both men & women. And
